metadata.title: CVE-2021-31807 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in Squid before 4.15 and 5.x before 5.0.6. Aninteger overflow problem allows a remote server to achieve Denial ofService when delivering responses to HTTP Range requests. The issue triggeris a header that can be expected to exist in HTTP traffic without anymalicious intent.

criterions.comment: squid3: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
